comments.content:
It appears as though nova/compute/api.py is not correctly setting the context to be elevated in get_all_across_zones.

I monkey patched it to add context = context.elevated() on line 530 (directly above instances = self.db.instance_get_all_by_reservation) and it appears to have resolved it. I'll attach a diff in a moment.
